content: pattern by beginner s luckraft diy knit hoodie with neck warm youtube https //youtu be/qhwkeuumwc0 yarn lion brand hometown 10 oz / 284 g 162 yds / 148 m 1 5 skein needle 9 mm swatch & gauge 4 x 4 = 9 sts x 12 row desire neck measurement 20 cast on 46 or multiple of 2 rib k1 p1 until your desire length / i did 8 make sure that rib must be long enough for folding 1 | p age pattern by beginner s luckraft knitting in flat prep 2 row all knit x2 add 3 markers evenly edge yb slip1p… p1 increase ir1 rs yb sli1p k1 m1l k until 1 st before next m m1r k1 sm k1 mrl repeat increasing at the markers knit until last 2 sts m1r k1 p1 ir2 ws yb sl1p k until last 1 st p1 repeat ir1 & ir2 until your actual head measurement + 4 ~ 6 my head measurement 22 + 8 = 28 in total pattern by beginner s luckraft attention if you re using much thinner yarn and you want to increase more you might want to change how to increase if so you decide how many sts you want to add then increase evenly ex k10 m1r repeat until the end…something like that then garter sts until your desire length / i knitted 14 first st yb slip 1p last st p1 kitchener st bind off 1 knit front off 2 purl front 3 purl back off 4 knit back repeat 1 ~ 4 until all the sts are gone 2 | p age pattern by beginner s luckraft animal ear by crochet er1 ch2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from top = 6 sts er2 2 single_crochet in ea st = 12 sts er3 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st = 18 sts er4 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st = 24 sts er5 ~ er8 1 single_crochet in ea st = 24 sts er9 decrease = 12 sts slip_stitch to finish abbreviations k=knit pattern by beginner s luckraft 3 | p a g e p=purl r=row ir=increasing row er=ear row m s =marker s st s =stitch es rs=right side ws=wrong side m1r=make 1 right m1l=make 1 left chain=chain single_crochet=single_crochet decrease=single_crochet 2 together 3 | p age
